title: Defence of Milak = Memories of Milak
creator_credit: Keith Johnston and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Keith Johnston was a member of Btroop 2/10th commando squadron and served in Northern New Guinea during World War II. During the battle in Milak village, he was stuck in a pit with two others for over five days.
description: Keith Johnston was a member of Btroop 2/10th commando squadron and served in Northern New Guinea during World War II. During the battle in Milak village, he was stuck in a pit with two others for over five days.
